app.title: Supplementary Materials
app.p: The following are available online at https://www.mdpi.com/article/10.3390/plants10050930/s1, Figure S1: GO functional classification of assembled unigenes. Figure S2: KOG functional classification of assembled unigenes. Figure S3: KEGG pathway annotation of assembled unigenes. Figure S4: Distribution of transcription factor (TF) families. Figure S5: GO terms of DEGs among control light condition vs darkness. Figure S6: GO terms of DEGs among darkness condition vs exposure to light. Table S1: Summary of Illumina HiSeq4000 transcriptome sequencing and de novo assembly results. Table S2: Functional annotations of unigene Statistics from transcriptoms of Mentha canadensis. Table S3: Sequences of primers used for qRT-PCR. Supplementary of sequencing data: Sequence data of mint (Mentha Canadensis) menthol biosynthesis pathway genes.
